summary: Encapsulates a VITS (Variational Inference Text-to-Speech) model, handling initialization, data preparation, training, validation, optimizer setup, and inference to convert textual input into audio waveforms.
business_intent: Enable developers to integrate high‑quality, neural text‑to‑speech capabilities into products such as virtual assistants, content creation tools, and accessibility services, while also supporting model fine‑tuning and custom dataset training.
